<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>package_private</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ProgramEntityLoader</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>ProgramEntityLoader</name> <script><![CDATA[var ProgramEntityLoader = Class.create(); ProgramEntityLoader.prototype = Object.extendsObject(BaseEntity, { initialize: function(sysClassName) { this.sysClassName = sysClassName; },
entityObject: function(gr) { var entity = { sys_id: gr.getValue("sys_id"), name: gr.getValue("short_description"), description: gr.getDisplayValue("description"), number: gr.getValue("number"), state: gr.getDisplayValue("state"), portfolio: gr.getDisplayValue("portfolio"), start_date: gr.getDisplayValue("start_date"), end_date: gr.getDisplayValue("end_date"), duration: gr.getDisplayValue("duration"), color: this.entityColor(gr.getTableName()), owned_by: gr.getDisplayValue("program_manager"), owned_by_id: gr.getValue("program_manager") }; return entity; },
type: 'ProgramEntityLoader' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-12-09 19:57:26</sys_created_on> <sys_id>2b7c59609f101200598a5bb0657fcf4a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ProgramEntityLoader</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Program Management" source="com.snc.program_management">1110926b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d433e</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2b7c59609f101200598a5bb0657fcf4a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-21 09:20:07</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
